title: Palace sign Sakho on loan
text:
Mamadou Sakho joins Crystal Palace on loan from Liverpool By Michael Kelleher  54pm Crystal Palace have agreed a deal to take Liverpool defender Mamadou Sakho on loan for the rest of the season. 
Palace have been interested in the France international and spent what could amount to £14m on another defender, Patrick van Aanholt, earlier in the week. 
The sides were in negotiations over a permanent transfer but Palace were unwilling to meet Liverpool's £20m asking price. 
The 26-year-old defender becomes Palace's second signing of Deadline Day after the capture of Serbian midfielder Luka Milivojevic from Olympiacos . 
Sakho has not featured for Liverpool since April of last season and was reportedly withdrawn from a reserve match earlier this month because the club were concerned a potential injury could jeopardise any potential sale. Also See:
